byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED and CLIFFORD KRAUSS

abstract: Kinder Morgan said it would take over the El Paso Corporation and become the nation’s biggest player in transporting oil and natural gas.
snippet: Kinder Morgan said it would take over the El Paso Corporation and become the nation’s biggest player in transporting oil and natural gas.

headline.main: Kinder Morgan to Buy El Paso for $21.1 Billion
headline.print_headline: Energy Deal To Create Biggest Firm In Pipelines
